group_1.narration: It seems like Café LycoReco was swapped@around with some place called Mikazuki Villa...@Then we were taken by the girls who lived there@to somewhere called the...Coordinator's Shop?@Something like that, anyway.

group_1.textLeft: Hey hey, Takina.@Everyone went dead silent all of a sudden.

group_1.textRight: ...Right. I wonder if it was a good idea@to follow them here.
They may be the masterminds behind all this...
Perhaps they brought us to their hideout@to do as they will.

group_1.textLeft: Well, that girl saved our lives, didn't she?

group_1.textRight: That's… You're right, she did.@But it's still too early to trust them.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe this is some kind of secret superhero@gathering place...
...My apologies, but may I ask you to introduce@yourselves?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'm Chisato Nishikigi, the poster girl@for Café LycoReco!
…I'm Takina Inoue, a fellow LycoReco employee.

group_1.textLeft: …Is that true or not?@Your minds shall tell me all.

group_1.textRight: …Huh?

group_1.textLeft: …[wait:1.2][chara:101600:cheek_0][chara:101600:face_mtn_ex_000.exp3.json][chara:101600:motion_200][chara:101600:lipSynch_1]I see. It appears to be true.
...But what is "Lycoris"...?

group_1.textRight: What are you doing...?!

group_1.textLeft: I've read your minds.
I'm not one to easily trust people with guns,@after all.

group_1.textRight: Ggh...!

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what's this...?! A wire?!
Takina, what the heck!@Why'd you restrain her all of a sudden?!

group_1.textRight: They know about Lycoris!@We can't just leave things like this—!
Huh…? When did you?

group_1.textLeft: Wow…that's serious drive right there.@You think we should surrender?

group_1.textRight: Chisato... These people are very skilled.

group_1.textLeft: You two aren't alone in that realization.
...I mean, what kind of person would have@a restraining device like that?

group_1.textRight: W-wait just a second!

group_1.textLeft: You're trying something even now?

group_1.textRight: No no no!@We don't mean you guys any harm!
Takina is just way too serious...or more like,@way too quick on the draw...
I have to be because you aren't.

group_1.textLeft: Takina, please shut up just this once@before you make things even worse!
...We just wandered in here somehow!
Lycoris is not an evil organization!
Probably!
…What do you think, Kanagi?

group_1.textRight: …Yes, their hearts appear to be true.

group_1.textLeft: …Then let's start from the top.@Can you go over your story again?
Tell us about Lycoris.

group_1.textRight: You guys might be superheroes, but this isn't@something I can easily talk about.
You're the ones who turned hostile first@with your mind-reading and weird powers.
So before anything else, I need to know@who you guys are.
Like those powers I mentioned earlier…@You guys have some big secret…am I right?
I think we're better off speaking as equals,@don't you?

group_1.textLeft: ...We acted out of caution, but things are@certainly imbalanced.
Very well. I'll tell you our secret in turn.

group_1.textRight: Like, you guys are superheroes with your@secret society…something like that?

group_1.textLeft: Not quite.
We're Magical Girls.
We bear the duty of fighting Witches in exchange@for having a single wish granted.
Pertaining to that, mind-reading is@my signature power.

group_1.textRight: Magical Girls…!
Witches…@So that monster we encountered earlier…

group_1.textLeft: …Well yeah, pretty much.
Sometimes Witches are the cause of crimes@and accidents.
We defeat Witches in order to prevent that@from happening.
But we don't want everyone knowing about this.

group_1.textRight: Then that makes you and us kind of alike.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, we've told you guys everything.@Now it's your turn!

group_1.textRight: Oh… Do we really have to say it?
I'm pretty sure you guys would be in danger@if you become aware…

group_1.textLeft: If you'd rather not talk, I can read your minds@instead.

group_1.textRight: [chara:406101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]No no no! Not that!@That's embarrassing!
Hmmmm…@Well...you have a point.
You guys told us your secret…and you saved us@from that…Witch thing.
…Are you going to tell them?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm… Might as well!
Right, so we're Lycoris!
And what's Lycoris?

group_1.textRight: We are agents of an independent security@group known as the DA.
It's a secret organization responsible for@maintaining security and public order.
We prevent crimes and incidents before@they occur,
by secretly disposing of criminals and terrorists.

group_1.textLeft: …Did you really have to tell them about DA?

group_1.textRight: [chara:406201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh…? Didn't you just say we should?

group_1.textLeft: No, I mean…you could've fibbed a little@or something…

group_1.textRight: Then you should have said something earlier!

group_1.textLeft: Ah well…@So yeah, that's the gist of it!
Without anyone knowing, we eliminate those@who would disturb society!
Ensuring that everyone believes they live in@a safe and peaceful city…
That's the mission for us Lycoris agents!
Agents of an official secret organization@that protects the country....

group_1.textRight: Preventing crimes before they occur…@[chara:101501:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:101501:cheek_0][chara:101501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:101501:lipSynch_1]That's a little like what we do!

group_1.textLeft: Fighting in your school uniforms with guns@and stuff… That's incredible!

group_1.textRight: School uniforms are least likely@to draw attention.
Urban camouflage, basically.

group_1.textLeft: That's so cool!@It's just like a movie!

group_1.textRight: I know, right?!
All that said, Café LycoReco is Lycoris@for individuals.

group_1.textLeft: For individuals?

group_1.textRight: Right, we help those in need!@Like, we assist at nursery schools,
take work as foreign language teachers,@and even serve as bodyguards.
It's sort of like a DA branch,@but also not…you know?
But still, this is a dangerous organization@we're talking about.
They'll do whatever it takes to ensure secrecy…@So don't tell anyone, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...you're right. It certainly sounds dangerous@given what we've learned...
Erm... So we managed to share our secrets@with each other.
So…maybe we can get along now?

group_1.textRight: ...Yes. I'm sorry for the surprise attack earlier.

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm sorry for being brash and reading@your mind.
We learned you had guns, so we were on@our guard.

group_1.textRight: Ahaha… Well, of course.

group_1.textLeft: ...And since you two come from another world...
I presume you still want to return@to your old one?

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure we're all in the same boat.
Mikazuki is a place we cherish as well.

group_1.textRight: So why don't we all help each other get@our places back?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! That'd be great, right, Takina?

group_1.textRight: Yes, we'd be grateful for the help.

group_1.textLeft: Right, then...@We're going to bring Mikazuki Villa back...

group_1.textRight: And we're gonna return to our world@with Café LycoReco!

group_1.textLeft: Let's form a united front.
Allow me to introduce myself again.@I'm Yachiyo Nanami. Nice to meet you.

group_1.textRight: I'm Chisato Nishikigi!@Pleased to meetcha!
…And I'm Takina Inoue.@I look forward to working with you.
